post:
[**Bitronictech.net**](https://www.bitronictech.net) is having a special deal for people who are looking for annual hosting. For the rest of October we are offering one year **1GB** **Shared Hosting** for $10. To obtain this discount, you must use the following link.

**The discounted pricing will be reflected on the payment page. No promo code necessary!**

-----

**Economy Class**

* **Disk Space: 1GB**
* **Bandwidth: 20GB**
* **Email Accounts: 1**
* **MySQL Databases: 1**
* **Subdomains: 1**
* **FTP Accounts: 1**
* **Anon FTP: 1**
* **SSL: Yes**
* **CGI : Yes**
* **Spam Assassin: Yes**
* **PHP: Yes**
* **Parked Domains: 0**
* **Addon Domains: 0**

[**Order Now!**](https://portal.bitronictech.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=110)

-----

Our Linux Shared Hosting features CPanel; PHP, 99.9% Uptime, 24/7 Support, Open Source scripts for easy setup and much more.

We accept  Bitcoins, and Credit/Debit. [**Bitronictech.net**](https://www.bitronictech.net) also offers [**Cloud Hosting**](https://portal.bitronictech.net/cart.php?gid=22) and [**Dedicated Servers.**](https://portal.bitronictech.net/cart.php?gid=4)
If you have any questions regarding our services, please open a [**ticket**](https://portal.bitronictech.net/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3) on our site [**Bitronictech.net**](https://www.bitronictech.net).
